description.brief: Servo, Phidget and STOC camera drivers.

stack.description: This stack contains ROS drivers for Phidgets pressure, RFID and accelerometer sensors, Phidgets InterfaceKit, Dynamixel servos, Videre Stereo cameras. Also includes low level C++ serial port interface via Gearbox project.
stack.author: Maintained by Antons Rebguns (UA Robotics Research Group)
